alert.note: Alert for McKean; Potter; Tioga; Warren (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 28 at 10:28AM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF MCKEAN...WARREN... POTTER...AND TIOGA COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of heavy snow which can rapidly reduce visibility to a quarter of a mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 1027 AM EDT, a band of heavy snow was along a line extending from Erie to Salamanca to Dushore and moving southeast at 40 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Warren, Bradford, Kane, Coudersport, Wharton, Morris, Port Allegany, Sheffield, Columbus, Youngsville, Smethport, Wetmore, Russell, Roulette, Galeton, Shinglehouse, Genesee, Betula, Gaines and James City. * This includes the following highways... Route 6 from near Corry to Ansonia. Route 15 near near Liberty. Route 62 from south of Tidioute to the New York border. Route 219 from north of Wilcox to the New York border. State Road 46 from Smethport to Farmers Valley. State Road 59 from Warren to Smethport. State Road 66 from James City to Kane. State Road 446 from Farmers Valley to the New York border. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this band of heavy snow. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
